systems.name: Garage User Interface System
systems.description: System governing the user interface for tank customization and management in the Garage.
systems.mechanics: Players interact with various UI elements to view, sort, and customize tanks and their decorations.
systems.objectives: Provide an intuitive and efficient way for players to manage their tanks and decorations.
interactions: Clicking on 'Wrap bar' displays wrap options.
Clicking on 'Decal bar' displays decal options.
Clicking on 'Sticker bar' displays sticker options.
Clicking on 'Custom bar' displays AI-generated decorations.
Selecting a tank icon shows detailed information about the tank.
Attempting to purchase a decor item triggers the 'Confirmation box'.
systems.source_note: Image Content Analysis: Garage Userflow diagram and related tables.

logic_rules.description: Tanks are sorted with owned items listed before unowned ones.
logic_rules.effect: Owned tanks appear at the top of the list.
logic_rules.source_note: Table Analysis: Sorting logic for tanks.

logic_rules.description: Unowned tanks are sorted by currency type, prioritizing Gold over Diamond.
logic_rules.effect: Gold-based tanks appear before Diamond-based tanks among unowned items.
logic_rules.source_note: Table Analysis: Sorting logic for tanks.

logic_rules.description: Unowned tanks of the same currency type are sorted by cost, with cheaper items listed first.
logic_rules.effect: Cheaper tanks appear before more expensive ones within the same currency category.
logic_rules.source_note: Table Analysis: Sorting logic for tanks.

logic_rules.description: The Wrap bar is selected by default when entering the Garage.

requirements.title: Decor Sorting Logic
requirements.description: Implement sorting logic for tank decorations based on ownership, currency type, and cost.
requirements.acceptance_criteria: Decorations are sorted correctly according to the specified hierarchy: Owned > Unowned, Gold > Diamond, Cheap > Expensive.
